people_also_ask.heading: Today, the Pong Game is considered to be the game which started the video games industry, as it proved that the video games market can produce significant revenues. Nolan Bushnell founded Atari at 1972 in order to create games and ideas and license them to other companies for mass production.
people_also_ask.title: Pong Game

people_also_ask.heading: "Certainly, they took the idea," says Mark Baer, "and ran with it." Pong, besides being a more polished, refined, and fun version of Odyssey's tennis game, had one big advantage: Since Atari released it not as a home machine but as a coin-operated game, the cost of entry was 25 cents.09-Jan-2015

knowledge_panel.description: pong is a table tennis–themed arcade sports video game, featuring simple two-dimensional graphics, manufactured by atari and originally released in 1972. wikipedia
